responses.rationale: Describes vaccine capability/potential supply ('could provide 4.8 million doses if needed') without active reassurance.
Describes a process/capability timeline ('can take four to six months') without active reassurance.
Describes technology capabilities/advantages ('offers advantages in efficacy, speed of development and production, scalability, and reliability') without active reassurance.
Describes technology used in vaccines ('use messenger RNA, the technology used in their COVID-19 vaccines') without active reassurance.
